entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C
